content.body: So after 2901, is there a rule about when to use entities and when not? (other than "Do what `npm run format` says")

So after 2901, is there a rule about when to use entities and when not? (other than "Do what npm run format says")

content.body: The rule is, don't use entities except for `&` and `<`
content.formatted_body: The rule is, don't use entities except for & and <
